data.title: Nawansh Singla on LinkedIn: #job #hiring #referral #fresher
data.meta_description:
If you are looking for a referral to ZS associates, then this post is for you. 

1
ZS is hiring a Business Technology Solution associate 
Batch- 0-2 years 
Job… | 12 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
*Salesforce is hiring!* Position: Data Analyst Qualifications: Bachelor’s/ Master’s Degree Experience: Freshers/ Experienced Location: Bangalore, India Amazon hiring for Business Analyst Honeywell is hiring! Position: Data Scientist II Qualifications: Bachelor’s/ Master’s/ MBA Salary: 8- 15 LPA (Expected) Experience: 1 year Experience Location: Bangalore @Gen AI openings for senior professionals at *Deloitte* "Apply Link in comments" Comment "CFBR" instead Interested. If you assist others, someone will assist you. Disclaimer :- I want to clarify that I do not charge individuals for placement services, nor do I want them to get caught in any scams. My main goal is to support candidates throughout the application process. It's important to note that the job mentioned does not belong to me; it belongs to the owner. However, I have every right to assist candidates in applying various internships and jobs. please use computer(pc) for better experience !

Hiring! We are hiring for the position of Fake HR. Number of openings available - Uncountable Requirements: 1) You should have a LinkedIn profile. 2) You should be good at creating fake job alerts. 3) You should be unemployed but able to offer a salary up to 9 LPA. 4) You should not ask interested candidates to DM or email their CVs; instead, ask them to comment "INTERESTED." 5) You should not respond to the comments you receive on the post but invest your time in creating a new fake job alert post. 6) Your primary focus will be struggling freshers. 7) Candidates who list their location as 'WFH' will be preferred. Comment "Interested" so that we can contact you. #hiring #scamalert #hiringalert #scam #fraud #jobalerts #copypaste #kodebuddy #hackerbucket #tcs #infosys #accentureindia #virtualinternship #virtusa #cognifyztechnologies #cognizant #amazon #flipkart #meta #recruitment

Please don't ignore this post... It's a genuine and humble request. I have been searching for jobs for months, and any leads would be highly appreciated. Despite participating in numerous interviews, unfortunately, I haven't received any job offers even after clearing rounds. It seems that there are certain constrains or specific role requirements are causing the problem. #Opentowork can be one of the most financially and emotionally draining experiences since I am the sole bread earner, but I am #NotGivingUp easily. I am still #Open ForNew Opportunities. I would really appreciate any assistance or guidance, even if it is the smallest of things, like liking the post, sharing it, reposting, or commenting on this post to help increase its visibility, as your 2 minutes of time can literally save and make someone's career. Experience - Data Scientist Trainee for 1 year , 2 months. Open for #recruitment to fresher opportunities also in which my skills are align with job opportunity. Prefer: PAN India Preferred Location - Hyderabad Notice period - Immediate #Deloitte #Capgemini #TCS #KPMG #PwC #IBM #TechMahindra #Genpact #Infosys #Wipro #HCL And #Opentowork with all other reputed companies. You are welcome to give any suggestions, advices or any help if this post reach you. #lookingforopportunities #lookingforemployment #helpme #help #newcareeropportunities #career

Seeking Your #Support, Dear #LinkedIn Community, It's a genuine and humble request. I have been searching for #job but didn't find any luck, and any leads would be highly appreciated. Despite Applying to numerous #Jobs through #Naukri and #LinkedIn, unfortunately, I haven't received any job offers or interviews. It seems that there are certain constraints or specific role requirements are causing the problem. I kindly ask for your support in the following ways: #Connections: If you know of any job openings that align with my skills, please let me know or connect me with someone who might be hiring. #Referrals: A personal recommendation or referral can make a huge difference. If you could refer me to opportunities within your network, I would be deeply grateful. #Advice: Any tips or advice on navigating this job search, especially given the current market conditions, would be greatly appreciated. Please feel free to reach out to me directly on LinkedIn or via email. #OPENTOWORK. I am still #Openfornewopportunities. I would appreciate any assistance or guidance, even if it is the smallest of things, like liking the post, sharing it, reposting or commenting on this post to help increase it's visibility as your 2 minutes can save and make someone's career. Thank you all for your time, support, and consideration. Your help means the world to me as I navigate this transition. - Preferred domain: Python Developer, Java developer, Software Engineer, Software Testing, Data Analyst. - Preferred location: Banglore, Hyderabad, Chennai -Experience : Fresher Graduate(2024) - Notice period: Immediate joiner - Email: yaramaddujeevitha450@gmail.com Goldman Sachs Mindtree Genpact TCS Infosys Concentrix Capgemini HCL Tech Cisco Deloitte Nvidia Alphabet IBM R System Software Radical Minds Technologies Pvt. Ltd. KPMG India Jindal Steel & Power Ltd. Info Edge India Ltd Amazon Flipkart EXL Wipro Cognizant Accenture SAP Reliance American Express #hr #corporatehr #immediatejoiner #recruiter #bulkhiring #endtoendrecruitment #sourcing #screening #timemanagement #opentowork

Please do not ignore it! I would appreciate your attention to my current situation. I have been actively searching for job opportunities for several days now. I appreciate any leads or referrals you may have to offer. Despite my participation in various interviews, I have yet to receive any job offers, even after successfully clearing many rounds. It appears that there may be certain constraints or specific role requirements that are causing this difficulty. Thank you for your consideration. #Opentowork can be one of the most financially and emotionally draining and overwhelming experiences. #Openfornewopportunities. I would appreciate any assistance or guidance, even if it is the smallest of things, like liking the post, sharing it, reposting or commenting on this post to help increase its visibility as your 2 minutes can save and make someone's career. Below are my details for your consideration. Any lead would be highly appreciated. - Experience: Fresher - preferred job role: Software Engineer, Front-end Developer, Data Analyst - Preferred location: Delhi/Gurgaon/Noida/Bangalore/Pune/Hyderabad - Notice period: Immediate joiner/within 15 days Email: rahulpamnani2001@gmail.com Google Accenture in India Reliance Jio Jio Platforms Limited (JPL) TechMojo Solutions ZS Walmart MakeMyTrip Salesforce Delhivery TCS Samsung Electronics Paytm Ola McKinsey & Company Goldman Sachs Genpact IBM Flipkart Microsoft Cisco Oracle techbooz Xelerate Tech Mahindra Wipro Cognizant Capgemini American Express LinkedIn ANZ NVIDIA Intel Corporation #linkedin Any other companies with openings that I have missed.
